markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTheForgottenSanctum/) in {{lax3}}. ## Synopsis It appears that something has ''violently'' escaped the Collections wing of the Halls Obscured. Exploring the wing could help reveal more about this facility. ## Walkthrough * This quest is started by entering the Collections wing and will require the player to reach [The Assembly of Echoes](/theAssemblyOfEchoes/), accessible through the [Hall of Reconfiguration](/hallOfReconfiguration/) (using the vithrack elevator). The exit lies to the south and requires the player to fight the Memory Hoarder, tied to the forgotten archmage [Fyonlecg](/fyonlecg/). Killing it will complete the quest and grant access to the aperture required to complete [A Shout in the Dark](/aShoutInTheDark/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX03_Forgotten_Sanctum/lax03_cp_qst_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Under Observation''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Something appears to have violently escaped the Collections wing of the Halls Obscured. Exploring the wing in greater depth could reveal more about this facility. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Enter the Collections.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The Collections is due southwest of the Temple of Revelation. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the depths of the Collections.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I've arrived at the Enclosures level of the Collections. Descending deeper might reveal the nature of this wing and uncover whoever's in charge. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | I heard a blood-curdling scream echo up from a deeper level. It didn't sound like anything natural or sane. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | Another scream echoed from the depths, this time much louder. I must be getting close to their origin. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''5''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill the Memory Hoarder.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10005 | I found the administrator of this nightmarish menagerie. The creature is as much a prisoner as it is a jailor, and gave me no choice but to defend myself. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="7" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 2 | Find a way into the Collections proper |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | This doesn't appear to be the Collections. There must be a way down from here. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | [TEMP] If I can extend that bridge, I should be able to get everyone across. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | [TEMP] I spoke with the Vithrack Head Warden. If I bring him the information he seeks, I may be able to ally with him and his people. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | [TEMP] I've come across some sort of strange machine that looks like the flesh constructs down here. Perhaps I can do something useful with it. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | [TEMP] I have gained the allegiance of the vithrack. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20006 | [TEMP] The Vithrack Head Warden is dead. There will be no allying with them now. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | The Memory Hoarder is dead. I learned from its departing soul that that a device called the Trephine opens the way to the Body of Wael. Somehow, I now know how to activate it. |}
